wikipedia_page.main: Graeme Archer (born 1 February  1967) is a Scottish lawn bowler from Edinburgh.

response: Graeme Francis Archer is a former English first-class cricketer.Graeme Archer at ESPNcricinfo A middle order batsman, he played 100 first-class matches for Nottinghamshire from 1992 to 1999.  He was awarded his Nottinghamshire cap in 1995.  He later played Minor Counties Championship cricket for Staffordshire and Cheshire and club cricket in the Derbyshire Premier Cricket League.

In 2011 he won the pairs bronze medal at the Atlantic Bowls Championships. The following year he won his third World Championship gold in the triples at the 2012 World Outdoor Bowls Championship with Graeme Archer and Darren Burnett, he also won a fours bronze medal.

In 2014, whilst living in Australia she married Scottish international bowler Graeme Archer and in 2015 retired from bowls. In 2016 her relationship with Archer ended when he returned to Scotland to live.
